hooks.description: Prevent agents from making git commits or pushes to ensure human oversight

userPromptSubmitHook.command: bash -c 'if echo "$CLAUDE_USER_PROMPT" | grep -E "git (commit|push)"; then echo "ERROR: Git commit/push operations are not allowed for enterprise agents. Human oversight required for version control operations."; exit 1; fi'
